scripts.build:ios: npm run build && cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --target aarch64-apple-ios-sim --debug && cp target/aarch64-apple-ios-sim/debug/deps/libpeek_save_lib.a gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Debug/libapp.a
scripts.build:ios:release: npm run build && cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --target aarch64-apple-ios && cp target/aarch64-apple-ios/release/deps/libpeek_save_lib.a gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Release/libapp.a
scripts.dev:ios:quick: mkdir -p src-tauri/gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Debug && cp src-tauri/target/aarch64-apple-ios-sim/debug/deps/libpeek_save_lib.a src-tauri/gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Debug/libapp.a && open src-tauri/gen/apple/peek-save.xcodeproj && npx vite --port 1420
